nodes.text: Brant Rumble was a Sullustan podracer on the Tatooine circuit. Rumble's small stature and cybernetic enhancements made him a formidable racer during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. His contemporary and competitor Sebulba once stole and damaged Rumble's podracer to recover Gardulla's stolen Ghostling children, but the Dug paid for the repairs without worry.
